name: Operation Gridius
description:
Hey, totally anonymous crew member, do you know your mission, right? Even though, let's review it.

Your objective is only one: Do you see this? Yeah! Its a bomb! All you have to do is search these and pass near it. The activation is automatic. 

Seems easy, right? Well, no. You will have to dodge a lot of obstruction, hazards and enemies that will be waiting for you. They are rough and wild and might kill you if you get too close. Try to avoid them!

Almost finished. Set your jetpack right. It will be your best ally down there. To control it, Press W or SPACE to activate the thruster. At least, but not less, you might find practical to rotate yourself with A and D.

Another thing. Please, do not forget to exit that death hollow before all falls apart. You’ll have a chronometer to make sure of that. We cannot afford another crew down.

All say, buddy. 

That the motherland spirit be with you. We expect you right back.

TEAM MEMBERS

PRODUCERS: Francisco Poluyan, Lino Hassan, Miguel Pignatiello.

GAME DESIGNERS: Francisco Roldan, Miguel Pignatiello, Pedro Carbone.

PROGRAMMERS: Alan Krulfeld, Ignacio Fernandez Lemos.

GRAPHIC  ARTISTS: Milagros Orozco, Olivia Fainberg Rocchi, Sofia Nadia Oliva.

UI ARTISTS: Francisco Poluyan, Francisco Roldan, Sofia Nadia Oliva.

SOUND DESIGN: Guido Fazzito.
